1.0.2.en: Add support for additional Tuya garage door fingerprints

1.0.4.en: Fixed open time alarm functionality and improved button trigger reliability with better timeout handling

1.0.5.en: Improved flow trigger reliability with better error handling and logging

1.0.6.en: Add command debouncing to prevent device lockout and improve trigger reliability

1.0.7.en: Add early detection and auto-retry for unresponsive door commands
